Strategy

A character can select an ally with a lower Rank and assign them a strategy, dictating the actions of AI characters and changing the objective ticker of player characters.

1st and 2nd strategies are mutually exclusive

3rd, 4th, and 5th strategies are mutually exclusive

Callout Warrior Guardian Mystic Healer Polymath
1st Soldier Hero Knight Cleric Scholar
2nd Berserker Escort Mage Surgeon Tinkerer
3rd Assassin Altruist Monk Physician Artist
4th Rival Buddy Sorcerer Doctor Trickster
5th Cavalry Tank Alchemist Necromancer Strategist
